Punch/The Oblitercons:



Punch pressed a few buttons letting a whole ten by ten foot in the shields 
open up for DevilDuer.  The one-time double agent left the bridge of the Iron 
Fist and headed out the hole of that shield, heading for the Otyebis.

---

The Oblitercons, finished refueling themselves from the pointless venture 
with Wolfgang, and headed off for Washington State, ready to win a tournament.
